The '''Siege of Great Wyk''' was a battle of the [[Greyjoy Rebellion]]. Following the destruction of the [[Iron Fleet]] at the [[Battle of Fair Isle]], [[Stannis Baratheon]] led the [[Iron Throne|royal]] fleet in a counterattack and subdued [[Great Wyk]], the largest of the [[Iron Islands]], while [[Old Wyk]] [[Siege of Old Wyk|fell]] to Ser [[Barristan Selmy]]. These two victories paved the way for the subsequent [[Siege of Pyke]], which spelled the end of the [[ironborn]] rebellion.<ref>"[[Greyjoy Rebellion (Histories & Lore)]]"</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Stannis Baratheon led an assault on Great Wyk during the Greyjoy Rebellion.
